en.title: [2Q 2025] Balance of Payments
en.description: Quarterly balance of payments, covering the current account, capital account, and financial account.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly balance of payments data, covering the current account (CA), capital account (KA), and financial account (FA).

bm.title: [ST2 2025] Imbangan Pembayaran
bm.description: Imbangan pembayaran suku tahunan, merangkumi akaun semasa, akaun modal, dan akaun kewangan.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data imbangan pembayaran suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi akaun semasa (CA), akaun modal (KA), dan akaun kewangan (FA).
